description: Detects suspicious powershell process starts with base64 encoded commands (e.g. Emotet)
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Markus Neis
Jonhnathan Ribeiro
Daniil Yugoslavskiy
Anton Kutepov
oscd.community
name: Suspicious Encoded PowerShell Command Line
query: ((((process.executable.text:("*\\powershell.exe" OR "*\\pwsh.exe")) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("PowerShell.EXE" OR "pwsh.dll"))) AND (((process.command_line.text:"*\ \-e*" AND process.command_line.text:("*\ JAB*" OR "*\ SUVYI*" OR "*\ SQBFAFgA*" OR "*\ aQBlAHgA*" OR "*\ aWV4I*" OR "*\ IAA*" OR "*\ IAB*" OR "*\ UwB*" OR "*\ cwB*"))) OR (process.command_line.text:("*.exe\ \-ENCOD\ *" OR "*\ BA\^J\ e\-*")))) AND (NOT process.command_line.text:"*\ \-ExecutionPolicy\ remotesigned\ *"))
